complaint_focus: VA DPOR Complaint - Kettler Management Inc. License #0226025311

timeline.event: KETTLER parent company founded
Kettler Management Inc. incorporated (as KSI Management Corp)
KSI Management Corp renamed to Kettler Management Inc.
WEINSTEIN MANAGEMENT CO INC licensed (15 years before Skidmore)
timeline.significance: Firm licensed 15 years before principal broker was licensed

timeline.event: BELL PARTNERS INC licensed (14 years before Skidmore)
timeline.significance: Firm licensed 14 years before principal broker was licensed

timeline.event: Williams v. Kettler Management Inc. filed
timeline.court: U.S. District Court for the District of Maryland
timeline.significance: Litigation during principal broker gap period

timeline.event: BAINBRIDGE MID ATLANTIC MANAGEMENT LLC licensed (13 years before Skidmore)
timeline.significance: Firm licensed 13 years before principal broker was licensed

timeline.event: BOZZUTO MANAGEMENT COMPANY licensed (12 years before Skidmore)
timeline.significance: Firm licensed 12 years before principal broker was licensed

timeline.event: KETTLER MANAGEMENT INC receives Virginia Firm License #0226025311
timeline.significance: Principal broker gap period begins - no principal broker assigned

timeline.event: DC Attorney General lawsuit - drug nuisance at 199-unit housing development
timeline.violation: Maintained drug nuisance over past decade

timeline.event: GABLES RESIDENTIAL SERVICES INC licensed (9 years before Skidmore)
timeline.significance: Firm licensed 9 years before principal broker was licensed

timeline.event: Kettler Management Inc. registered in Florida as Foreign Profit Corporation
Housing Rights Initiative v. Bozzuto - Kettler named as defendant
timeline.court: U.S. District Court for the District of Maryland
timeline.significance: Kettler and Bozzuto both list Skidmore as principal broker

timeline.event: Facebook Age Discrimination Class Action
timeline.violation: Excluded people over 50 from Facebook housing advertisements

timeline.event: Coleman v. Kettler Management - Employment discrimination
timeline.court: U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of Virginia
timeline.violation: Race and disability discrimination, hostile work environment

timeline.event: Edward Hyland starts at Kettler as Senior Regional Manager (unlicensed)
Equal Rights Center v. Kettler Management - Complaint filed
timeline.court: Superior Court of the District of Columbia

timeline.event: Washington City Paper utility fee investigation published
findings: Jamison at Dakota Crossing: $1,500 water bills for 9 months

timeline.event: Equal Rights Center v. Kettler Management - Settlement $140,000
timeline.violation: Source of income discrimination across 6 DC properties
timeline.significance: Pattern of discrimination, occurred during principal broker gap period

timeline.event: Caitlin Marie Skidmore assigned as Principal Broker (License #0225273926)
timeline.location: Frisco, TX (1,300 miles from McLean VA)
timeline.significance: Principal broker gap ends, but geographic violation begins

timeline.event: Caitlin Marie Skidmore individual license issued
timeline.significance: Skidmore licensed AFTER 8 firms that list her as principal broker

timeline.event: BBB complaint - 800 Carlyle maintenance issues
BBB complaint - Washington DC mandatory $60/month cable/internet fee
timeline.violation: Mandatory non-optional fee, tenants cannot opt out

timeline.event: BBB complaint - Alexandria VA application discrimination
timeline.violation: Single mother of Ukrainian origin - manager rude, income requirements higher than published

timeline.event: AHC partnership - Kettler to manage 24 properties, 3,000 units in Arlington
timeline.significance: Significant expansion during supervision violation period

timeline.event: Edward Hyland denies reasonable accommodation request (unlicensed)
timeline.activity: Lease termination decision, reasonable accommodation denial

firms: WEINSTEIN MANAGEMENT CO INC (15 years before)
BAINBRIDGE MID ATLANTIC MANAGEMENT LLC (13 years before)
GABLES RESIDENTIAL SERVICES INC (9 years before)
MCCORMACK BARON MANAGEMENT INC (8.5 years before)
BURLINGTON CAPITAL PROPERTIES LLC (6.5 years before)

cases: Equal Rights Center v. Kettler ($140K settlement)

significance: Comprehensive timeline showing pattern of violations, supervision failures, and regulatory non-compliance spanning over 10 years
